price: İman edip de salih amel işleyenler var ya, biz onları mutlaka salihler (iyiler) arasına sokacağız.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُدۡخِلَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lanud'khilannahum fī al-ṣāliḥīna
